price: A man came from the farthest end of the city, rushing, and said, “O my people, follow the messengers.
arabic: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
